description:
Value of open source tools for mobile developers

   • For Developer    • Provide common development environment for fragmented device market
   • Standard – often same or similar tools for desktop or web
   • Can contribute/fix



   • For Device Provider    • Shared Investment
   • Can innovate on tooling instead of reinventing
   • Can leverage years of features and stability from popular tools



What are the tools    • GNU compilers and debuggers, QEMU
   • WebKit, html5, Eclipse
   • New tools/standards to help developers write once and deploy everywhere    • phonegap
   • Titanium Appcelerator
   • Bondi



Case study of transforming Symbian code base to open source    • Technical challenges
   • Legal/licensing challenges
   • Cultural challenges
   • Success stories
title: Building an Open Source Eco-System for Mobile Tool Developers
